short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your thoughts and easily save important information while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture Notes Instantly: Save notes directly from your browser, including text and URLs, with just a few clicks.
Seamless Organization: Search, filter, and manage your notes efficiently with an intuitive interface.
Customizable Themes: Switch between light and dark modes to match your preferences.
Multi-Language Support: Available in multiple languages for a personalized experience.
Export Your Notes: Easily download all your notes as a text file for backup or offline access.
Perfect for students, professionals, or anyone who needs a quick and reliable way to capture and manage notes while browsing.

Try Quick Notes today and simplify your digital life!
